message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper discusses the evaluation of text-to-text generation, specifically in the context of Text Simplification (TS). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of metrics for evaluation, which suggests that it could also be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also includes a correlation analysis, which could be relevant to sub-categories such as cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
